subject: RE: [junit] How to - Test Case for an Abstract class / Inteface ?
msgSnippet: There are plenty of responses to this in the archive.  I suggest you first do a search through the archive (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit), then ask a
messageBody:
There are plenty of responses to this in the archive. I suggest you
first do a search through the archive
(http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit), then ask a more specific question
here. You can also look here http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?AbstractTestCases
(which, by the way, J.B. also posted in a response to a very similar
question --> message #7181 of 7522 when I did the 1 minute search just
now).

=jason
[:question | ^One]
-----Original Message-----
From: kannan@... [mailto:kannan@...]
Sent: Friday, April 04, 2003 6:25 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] How to - Test Case for an Abstract class / Inteface ?


Hi Groups

There is an abstract class, which implements an interface.
I want to write a test cases for these abstract class.
Do I need to write and factory class for that? any Idea?
Any the better solution?

Thanks in advance
kannan
